Package Model

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameObject
      • Model.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrowShot, BossAttack, BowShot, Enemy, Player, PlayerSwing
    public abstract class Character
extends GameObject
    Abstract class for characters that can move and do damage
    Author:
    Wes Rodgers
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:

      • getDirection

        public int getDirection()
        returns the direction the character is facing
        Returns:
        1 if the character is facing north, 2 if west, 3 if south, 4 if east.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection​(int direction)
        sets the direction the character is facing
        Parameters:
        direction - 1 if north, 2 if west, 3 if south, 4 if east.
